==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|あん|yomi=o|こう}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=あんこう}} {{m|zh|安康|tr={{IPAchar|/ʔan khang/}}|lit=peace + tranquility}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|安康|tr=ānkāng}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|あんこう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あんこう|hhira=あんかう}}

# the state of being [[safe and sound]], in [[tranquility]] and [[good]] [[health]]

====Proper noun====
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|安康天皇}}
{{ja-pos|proper|あんこう|hhira=あんかう}}

# {{short for|sort=あんこう|安康天皇|tr=Ankō Tennō||{{w|Emperor Ankō}}|lang=ja}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|あんこう|hhira=あんかう}}

# to be [[safe and sound]]
# to make something be [[safe and sound]]
